about_the_game:
Mysterious laughter echoed from the river on that restless summer night. Why the hell did you get out of the tent? You find yourself drawn into the gloomy world of Midnight Swamp, filled with strange inhabitants and thrilling puzzles.

Soon, the Witch from the gingerbread house is teaching you the basics of potion craft, and a talking Cat is convincing you to infiltrate the inhospitable castle towering over the swamp. But can you trust the locals? Do you have the courage to uncover the secrets of this place?
Well, it seems you have no choice...



  • A variety of puzzles, potion crafting, and location exploration
  • A dark swamp hiding a sinister secret
  • Many strange inhabitants to meet
  • Hand-drawn graphics

Soon, the Witch from the gingerbread house is teaching you the basics of potion craft, and a talking Cat is convincing you to infiltrate the inhospitable castle towering over the swamp. But can you trust the locals? Do you have the courage to uncover the secrets of this place?
Well, it seems you have no choice...

name: Midnight Swamp Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A grim point-and-click adventure where you dive into a world of dark fairy tales. Play as a tourist who must find a way out of the mysterious Midnight Swamp.
